Hello,

I am using Heritrix 3.0.1-SNAPSHOT and found that it now doesn't fl=
ush the logs very frequently, which makes it hard to watch crawl.log to see=
 if the crawling is going well.

The corresponding code seems to be flush()=
 method in GenerationFileHandler.java which was added in r7012.
I know that=
 is was added to improve performance, but it makes me very hard to test the=
 crawl settings. Is it possible to revert this change or make it configurab=
le so that you can flush every X records instead of the hard-coded 100?
